plot: Surrounded by the absurdities of the daily life of Sao Paulo, the stories of 19 people come together depicting a day in the life of all those who still dare to love.
title: Amor Sociedade Anonima
plot_es: Surrounded by the absurdities of the daily life of Sao Paulo, the stories of 19 people come together depicting a day in the life of all those who still dare to love.
plot_en: Surrounded by the absurdities of the daily life of Sao Paulo, the stories of 19 people come together depicting a day in the life of all those who still dare to love.
